body_html: Oh I actually got it working here. The reason is I am compiling on my centos server without sudo access. I need to use the customized gcc to compile blaze. I didn't set up blaze correctly. Once it was compiled with right gcc, the problem is gone.

body: Oh I actually got it working here. The reason is I am compiling on my centos server without sudo access. I need to use the customized gcc to compile blaze. I didn't set up blaze correctly. Once it was compiled with right gcc, the problem is gone.
